About the Company: Global Offshore Services Ltd presently owns and operates a fleet of six anchor handling tugs cum vesssels ( AHTSV`S) and five platform supply vessells (PSV`S). The company`s vessels are working in various markets including India, Europe and Far East.The companys vessels support the oil and gas exploration efforts and are presently employed with various E& P companies.platform supply vessels are employed in India and in the North Sea. The main functions of these vessels are transport of personnel to rigs from onshore bases and vice versa,delivery of cargo / material to rigs,anchor handling operations and Towing of rigs from one location to another.
